taskbody.context: To register the plugin for the DITA Open Toolkit, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Create a .txt file named license in the [DITA-OT-install-dir]/plugins/com.oxygenxml.webhelp directory.
In this file, copy your Oxygen Scripting license key which you purchased for your plugin.
step.info: The WebHelp transformation process reads the license key from this file. In case the file does not exit, or it contains an invalid license, an error message will be displayed.
